Sales Representative Job at Nuturapimp




        
    

        
        Nuturapimp is a trichological wellness center dedicated to preserving and enhancing the hair health of its clients by addressing not only external hair care practices but also the internal physiological, lifestyle, and environmental factors that influence hair growth, strength, and retention.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative
Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Duties and Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Greet all walk-in customers as they come into the store and ask them how they would like to be assisted.
	Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
	Work in line with company policy to achieve set sales targets and outcomes within schedule
	Provide daily sales reports as well as weekly and monthly reports of sales efforts in marked sales territory
	Process all cash and card payments.
	Answer first line queries and complaints from customers.
	Report discrepancies and problems to the shop manager.
	Give advice and guidance on product selection to customers.
	Balance cash registers with receipts.
	Resolve customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports and making recommendations to management
	Keep the store tidy and clean and ensure office assistants clean constantly.
	Working within established guidelines, particularly with product lines.
	Responsible for security within the store as well as looking out for fraudsters’ shoplifters and fraudulent credit cards etc.
	Coordinate all issues with key clients between sales, fulfillment and customer support
	Receiving and storing inventory.
	Keep a schedule of events / special promotions
	Work with management to organize and execute sales campaigns
	Perform all other duties as assigned


Job Requirements


	OND, HND or BSC in any related discipline preferably marketing, business and finance.
	1 year experience in direct sales,
	Record of substantial achievement of territory quotas with knowledge of a CRM tool
	Highly analytical with a drive for numbers
	Good networking, prospecting and closing skills
	High level of professionalism
	Result-oriented team player with exceptional motivation and interpersonal skills.
	Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
	Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills
	Good written and verbal communication skills
	Able to work in a fast-paced environment
	High proficiency in MS Office Suite
	Must be able to prepare management reports and correspondence
	Good initiative, time and stress management skills


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: qualitytalentzone@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Customer Care Representative Job at Myafrimall Logistics Limited




        
    

        
        Myafrimall Logistics Limited is a Nigerian logistics and delivery company focused on helping individuals, families, and businesses move goods safely and on time across Nigeria and beyond. With branches covering air cargo, sea cargo, and last?mile delivery locations, we provide end?to?end services from pick?up to final delivery, supported by dedicated customer service and structured operations. Guided by our vision “To be the heartbeat of global trade", we are working towards making Myafrimall a part of every home in Nigeria and the diaspora through reliable service, innovation, and strong partnerships.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Care Representative
     

            
    



Job Location: Sangotedo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary 


	Myafrimall Logistics Limited is a growing logistics company committed to making “Myafrimall in every home in Nigeria and the diaspora” a reality
	 We are looking for a Customer Service Representative for our Sangotedo branch to attend to walk?in and call?in customers and support daily branch operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Attend to customers politely and professionally (walk?in, phone, WhatsApp).
	Provide accurate information on prices, services, and delivery timelines.
	Open shipments, prepare waybills, and ensure correct documentation.
	Follow up on shipments with operations/warehouse and give timely feedback.
	Handle basic customer complaints or escalate where necessary.
	Keep records and daily reports neatly and accurately.


Requirements


	OND/HND/B.Sc. in any field. 1–2 years of customer service or front-desk experience (logistics/retail is an advantage).
	Good communication and people skills.
	Basic computer skills (WhatsApp, email, simple Excel/data entry).
	Must live in or around Sangotedo/Ajah axis and be willing to work fully onsite, including Saturdays.


Salary
N100,000 -  N120,000 monthly

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@myafrimall.com using “Customer Service Representative – Sangotedo Branch” as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
